prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Marian Colton Smith Harris Papers, Collection #5008, Special Collections, Carrier Library, James Madison University, Harrisonburg, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Received from Alumni Relations in May, 2003.

bioghist.head: Biographical/Historical Information
bioghist.p: Marian Colton Smith (Mrs. Tommie Harris), from Norwood, PA, was a 1935 graduate in Education. She was President of her class.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: This collection offers a few insights into life and social customs on campus in the 1930s. Comprising the collection are cards from the freshmen and senior classes, a postcard home requesting money, a telegram from the class of 1933, commencement invitations for 1933 and 1935, an undated invitation to tea off campus, a 1935 placement form for teaching, and teaching contracts for 1935 and 1938. Photographs of the Glee Club have been filed in the JMU Historic Photos collection.
